txt.en:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>

Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.

<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>

The Red Dawn Discipline allows the Lore-master to become the true master of knowledge and gain complete understanding of the world and how it works, supplying them with their most potent arsenal of abilities.
